name: Green Beans, Mushrooms And Mustard Sauce
keywords: dairy-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, green beans, white mushrooms, whole-grain mustard, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Trim and wash beans. Steam over water about 7 minutes.
Wash, trim stems and dry mushrooms. Slice thinly.
In serving bowl, combine mustard and vinegar; stir in mushrooms.
Drain beans and cut in half. Stir into mushrooms and dressing.
